articles.title: Two Men Tortured, Killed In Karnataka Village - NDTV
articles.description: Two men were tortured and killed at Peddanahalli village in Karnataka's Tumkuru on Thursday night. Their bodies were found today on the outskirts of the village. The police said they had criminal records and were out on bail.
articles.content:
No one has been arrested in the case yet, and the police are tight-lipped on the motive for the murder.
